sentences.en: I move on like a sinners prayer. I let them go like a levee breaks.
sentences.cn: 我象圣徒一般祈祷前行, 我的思绪象决堤汹涌.

sentences.en: Levee double - layer foundation is very common in levees along large rivers.
sentences.cn: 双层 堤基在大江大河防洪干堤中非常普遍.

sentences.en: Look at that levee of logs.
sentences.cn: 你看,就是那边的枯木长堤.

sentences.en: Look at that long levee of logs.
sentences.cn: 韩佳:你看,就是那边的枯木长堤.

sentences.en: Risks caused by many uncertainty factors in levee engineering are cared about by people.
sentences.cn: 堤防工程中因各种不确定性因素引起的风险正日益受到人们的关注.

sentences.en: Risks in levee engineering caused by many uncertainty factors are cared about by people.
sentences.cn: 堤防工程中因各种不确定因素引起的风险正日益受到人们的关注.

sentences.en: Said local levee as " Zhang embankment. "
sentences.cn: 当地称大堤为 “ 张公堤 ”.

sentences.en: The calculation method may offer a reference for Chinese levee code revision.
sentences.cn: 所介绍的计算方法对于我国堤防工程等规范的修订有一定的参考意义.

sentences.en: The Major General attended the President's levee in full uniform.
sentences.cn: 那位少将身着全套军服出席总统的招待会.

sentences.en: The model can be used in earth - rock allocation of mad engineering and levee engineering widely.
sentences.cn: 优化模型可以广泛应用于道路、堤防等工程的土石方调配问题中.

sentences.en: The pressure on dams and levee s is very strong.
sentences.cn: 大坝和堤防需要承受巨大的洪水冲击的压力.

sentences.en: Water poured over a levee and flooded about 75 percent of Montegut.
sentences.cn: 水漫过了河堤并淹没了蒙特古特75%的地区。

words.tran_cn: 堤坝（码头）；（旧时君主或显贵的）早晨接见

trans.tran_cn: 堤，早朝，<美>总统或其它高级官员所举行的招待会，专为某人举行的招待会
trans.tran_en: a special wall built to stop a river flooding
